data.name: sonoUno-desktop
data.description: SonoUno is a sonification software for astronomical data presented on a table (txt or csv files). The software is being developed based on the study of other software, standards of accessibility like the ISO 9241-171:2008 (Guidance on software accessibility) and theoretical framework based on literature review and end user tests.

evidence: README install command: "```python3 -m pip install -U -f https://extras.wxpython.org/wxPython4/extras/linux/gtk3/ubuntu-16.04 wxPython```\"
"SonoUno is a sonification software for astronomical data presented on a table (txt or csv files)."
"The principal goal of the SonoUno is to allow the user to open data files (txt or csv extension), show the plot and sonify the data."
